About Me #Srachet RaiI’m Srachet Rai, a cybersecurity professional with a background in computer science and a passion for creative design. I have worked on several projects ranging from network security to innovative software solutions.
My Journey #Graduated 2018BTech in Computer ScienceCompleted my BTech with a focus on cybersecurity and software development.Joined Industry 2019Cybersecurity AnalystStarted my career working on threat intelligence and security operations.Innovation 2021Project LeadLed innovative projects combining security with creative digital experiences.Feel free to connect with me on LinkedIn or Twitter.
title: About Me
